project.teaser: The EU has committed to becoming the first climate neutral continent by 2050 and counts on wind energy to become the backbone of a sustainable and reliable European energy system. The European Commission expects wind energy to meet 30% of electricity demand by 2030 and 50% by...
project.objective:
The EU has committed to becoming the first climate neutral continent by 2050 and counts on wind energy to become the backbone of a sustainable and reliable European energy system. The European Commission expects wind energy to meet 30% of electricity demand by 2030 and 50% by 2050, from 16% today. To deliver on these ambitions the EU will need clear guidance on the wind energy Research & Innovation challenges and how to address them by 2030 and 2050.
ETIPWind was established in 2016 by WindEurope with the support from the European Commission to bring stakeholders together to inform policymaking on the priority areas of Research & Innovation that will contribute to meet the EU’s climate and energy goals.
This project, SETIPWind, will strengthen the activities of the European Technology and Innovation Platform on Wind Energy (ETIPWind) and the SET Plan Implementation Working Group on Offshore Wind (IWG OW) so they continue providing guidance on R&I through clearly formulated recommendations in a timely fashion. It will also foster cohesion and knowledge sharing among all energy research stakeholders to ensure robust implementation of the EU’s SET-Plan Implementation Plans.
The project will achieve these objectives by establishing a joint Secretariat for both ETIPWind and the IWG OW that closely coordinates their activities, creating a joint work programme centred on EU energy and R&I policy-setting milestones, and offering more opportunities for stakeholder experts to come together and provide their feedback on the policy-making processes. The project will also connect the ETIPWind and IWG OW more closely with the other ETIPs and SET Plan stakeholder groups and develop joint positions, reports, and dissemination activities.
project.title: Support and coordination of the European Technology and Innovation Platform on Wind Energy (ETIPWind) and the SET-Plan Implementation Working Group on Offshore Wind (IWG OW).

article.title: Support and coordination for R&I in wind energy

result.title: Roadmap 2028-2035
result.description: This deliverable will document the long, medium, and short-term R&I areas for wind energy in preparation of the next round of policy priorities after the launch of the Horizon Europe Work Programme 2025-2027.

result.title: Gap analysis
result.description: This deliverable compares the Horizon Europe Work programme 202324 against the ETIPWind 2019 Roadmap The final deliverable will be an excel table or PDF file

result.title: Event with new representatives of the EU Institutions
result.description: This will be a physical event in Brussels to accommodate the agendas of newly appointed policymakers in EU institutions. The event will disseminate factsheet 2.

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 1 - SETIPWind (Support and coordination of the European Technology and Innovation Platform on Wind Energy (ETIPWind) and the SET-Plan Implementation Working Group on Offshore Wind (IWG OW).)
result.description: periodic
result.teaser: The SETIPWind project supports the coordination of activities of the European Technological Platform for Wind Energy (ETIPWind) and the SET Plan Implementation Working Group on Offshore Wind (IWG OW).The objectives of the SETIPWind project are to: • Ensure ETIPWind and the...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Kick-off event
result.description: This will be a hybrid event to launch the project It will have at least 4060 physical participants plus 50 online participants with at least 10 policymakers 33 industry and 33 academia The event will be recorded and uploaded to the ETIPWind website It will communicate and validate the new ETIPWind work programme and disseminate the Horizon Europe Work Programme 202324

result.title: SRIA video
result.description: Short animated video disseminating the key recommendations of the SRIA.

result.title: Workshop 1
result.description: This will be a physical event to provide the interaction and quality of discussion necessary for inputting to the gap analysis that will be the building block for the SRIA update and input the factsheet 1 It will disseminate the first annual competitiveness report

result.title: Contribution to annual SET-Plan report 2
result.description: Each year the Secretariat will prepare, coordinate, and submit the IWG OW’s contribution to the SET-Plan annual progress report.

result.title: Plan for communication dissemination and exploitation activities
result.description: The project will detail the tools and strategies to enhance the platforms impact and visibility in a Communication and Dissemination Plan Examples of this include bilateral meetings with policymakers increased presence in social media targeted emails at established intervals eg bimonthly more audiovisual material and interactive websites

result.title: Annual activity report 2022
result.description: The Secretariat will issue an annual report summarising all activities performed by ETIPWind and the IWG OW during the closing year including joint activities with other ETIPs and IWGs These reports will inform stakeholders on the progress of the groups in their deliverables These reports will also include relevant information for the official interim and final reporting to the European Commission

result.title: Annual Wind Energy Competitiveness Report 2
result.description: This deliverable tracks the progress wind R&I expenditure as well as other relevant competitiveness indicators. The final deliverable will be a slide deck in PDF format.

result.title: Factsheet 2
result.description: This deliverable will spell out the mega trends in wind energy to newly appointed policymakers. The final deliverable will be printed and uploaded in PDF format.

result.title: Annual activity report 2024
result.description: The Secretariat will issue an annual report summarising all activities performed by ETIPWind and the IWG OW during the closing year, including joint activities with other ETIPs and IWGs. These reports will inform stakeholders on the progress of the groups in their deliverables. These reports will also include relevant information for the official interim and final reporting to the European Commission.

result.title: Workshop 2
result.description: "This will be a physical event to provide the interaction and quality of discussion necessary to input into factsheet #2. It will showcase industry’s readiness to submit projects linked to the SRIA priorities through pitch sessions."

result.title: Launch event Strategic Research and Innovation Agenda
result.description: This will be a hybrid event and serve as the highlevel launch event for the SRIA It aims to have the European Commissioner for RI and national Ministers for RI as headline speakers It will include highlevel representatives of industry national governments and academia The event will be recorded and uploaded to the ETIPWind website

result.title: Media impact report 3
result.description: Short summary of the press coverage of the main project deliverables used in the dissemination campaigns.

result.title: Roadmap video
result.description: Short animated video disseminating the key recommendations of the Roadmap.

result.title: Press release 2
result.description: Press release supporting the launch of the Roadmap.

result.title: Press release 1
result.description: Press release supporting the launch of the SRIA.

result.title: Updated ETIPWind Strategic Research & Innovation Agenda
result.description: This deliverable will describe the R&I priorities of the wind energy sector It will also cover non-technical challenges to deployment of wind energy in Europe. The final deliverable will be printed and uploaded in PDF format.

result.title: Media impact report 1
result.description: Short summary of the press coverage of the main project deliverables used in the dissemination campaigns

result.title: Annual activity report 2023
result.description: The Secretariat will issue an annual report summarising all activities performed by ETIPWind and the IWG OW during the closing year, including joint activities with other ETIPs and IWGs. These reports will inform stakeholders on the progress of the groups in their deliverables. These reports will also include relevant information for the official interim and final reporting to the European Commission.

result.title: Factsheet 1
result.description: This deliverable will assess the RI measures set out in the draft National Energy and Climate Plans The final deliverable will be printed and uploaded in PDF format

result.title: Contribution to annual SET-Plan report 1
result.description: Each year the Secretariat will prepare coordinate and submit the IWG OWs contribution to the SETPlan annual progress report

result.title: ETIPWind Website update
result.description: The website of the ETIPWind will be updated according to the new visual identity and with the information related to the ETIPWind III

result.title: Annual Wind Energy Competitiveness Report 3
result.description: This deliverable will assess the R&I measures set out in the draft National Energy and Climate Plans. The final deliverable will be a slide deck in PDF format.

result.title: Workshop 3
result.description: This will be a physical event to provide the interaction and quality of discussion necessary to input into the Roadmap and to further disseminate the SRIA during the finalization of the Horizon Europe Work Programme 2024-25.

result.title: Media impact report 2
result.description: Short summary of the press coverage of the main project deliverables used in the dissemination campaigns.

result.title: Media impact report 4
result.description: Short summary of the press coverage of the main project deliverables used in the dissemination campaigns.

result.title: Minutes of the SC and IWG OW meetings
result.description: The minutes of the SC meetings will also be uploaded (in full) to the ETIPWind website at least two weeks after each meeting. The IWG meeting minutes will be shared with meeting participants. All meeting minutes will be made available to the European Commission at the end of the project.

result.title: Joint report on ‘How to achieve 500 GW of offshore renewables by 2050’
result.description: This deliverable will support delivery of the EU Offshore Renewable Energy Strategy. It will be developed in collaboration with ETIP Ocean, ETIPSNET, the IWG OW, and the IWG on HVDC. The final deliverable will be printed and uploaded to the ETIPs websites.

result.title: Updated ETIPWind structure, ToR for both SC and IWG OW
result.description: This document will outline the new structure governance and ToR of ETIPWind It will also include a list of the new SC chair vicechair and all other members This list will also be uploaded to the ETIPWind website and updated when necessary

result.title: Annual Wind Energy Competitiveness Report 1
result.description: This deliverable tracks the progress wind RI expenditure as well as other relevant competitiveness indicators The final deliverable will be a slide deck in PDF format

result.title: Contribution to annual SET-Plan report 3
result.description: Each year the Secretariat will prepare, coordinate, and submit the IWG OW’s contribution to the SET-Plan annual progress report.

result.title: Compilation of bi-monthly recaps and other mass e-mails
result.description: The Secretariat will compile the bi-monthly recap emails and all other mass-emails sent in a final summary.

result.title: Final project event and launch of the Roadmap 2028-2035
result.description: This will be a hybrid event and serve as the launch event for the Roadmap. It aims to have the high-level representatives from the European Commission (Director), national ministries (Director-General), industries (CTOs) and academia (Head of) as speakers. The event will include additional representatives of public authorities, industry, and academia. The event will be recorded and uploaded to the ETIPWind website.

category.title: wind energy
category.displayCode: /engineering and technology/environmental engineering/energy and fuels/renewable energy/wind energy

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
